response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This offer reflects the significant value I place on the product while also considering its worth to you at $1,200,000. I believe this price is fair and represents a win-win situation for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions.
